DataElement.preferredName: Operating Room Collected Specimen Gross Pathologic Examination Room Receive Person Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The name of the person that received the specimen in the pathology gross room in the format first initial last name.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Operating Room Collected Specimen Gross Pathologic Examination Room Receive
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A room in a health care facility equipped for the performance of surgical operations and procedures._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._An assessment of macroscopic pathological findings that are caused by disease._An area within a building enclosed by walls and floor and ceiling._To take, accept, or get something offered.
